ARTICLE.COMMENT: The current status of the Android vs iOS war.

ARTICLE.AUTHOR: Trevor Harmon

X.T: Port DLLs to Palm OS with ease - Porting with Perl brings dynamic Windows libraries to Palm OS with minimal fuss

ARTICLE.AUTHOR: Martyn Honeyford
ARTICLE.COMMENT: The author describes how he created a Perl script to automatically handle the function parameters, trap list... necessary because of the PalmOS idiosyncrasies.

X.T: Google I/O 2009 - Debugging Arts of the Ninja Masters

ARTICLE.AUTHOR: Justin Mattson
ARTICLE.COMMENT: How to use logcat, traceview and HierarchyViewer. Justin Mattson explains how to use a profiler, simplify a GUI structure... There is nothing new here, we were working the same way 15 years before with C++/Motif. But this may be of interest for young inexperienced developers.
